metadata.title: Our Team
metadata.description: Meet the talented researchers driving innovation in our lab

data.name: Alex Zhang
data.description: Working on multimodal learning and computer vision applications in medical imaging. Focuses on developing novel deep learning architectures for robust medical image analysis.

data.name: Chen Lin
data.description: Researching reinforcement learning and robotics, with a focus on dexterous manipulation and human-robot interaction. Developing algorithms for safe and efficient robotic control.

data.name: Li Wei
data.description: Contributing to computer vision projects, particularly in object detection and semantic segmentation. Developing efficient algorithms for real-time video analysis.

data.name: Liu Yan
data.description: Working on federated learning and privacy-preserving AI systems. Developing secure protocols for distributed machine learning across multiple institutions.

data.name: Wang Yu
data.description: Specializing in natural language processing and transformer models. Working on large language models for multilingual applications and cross-modal understanding.

data.name: Maria Garcia
data.description: Visiting from University of Barcelona, working on multimodal sensor fusion for autonomous vehicles. Contributing to our perception and decision-making research.

data.name: Hans Mueller
data.description: Visiting from ETH Zurich, specializing in robotic manipulation and haptic feedback systems. Collaborating on our dexterous manipulation projects.
